categories.name: Diagnostics & Troubleshooting
categories.description: Prompts for identifying and understanding vehicle issues.

prompts.title: Full System Sweep
prompts.text: Run a full diagnostic sweep on all vehicle systems and report any anomalies, warnings, or errors you find.

prompts.title: Explain DTC
prompts.text: I see an alert for code P0420. Can you explain what this diagnostic trouble code means and suggest a course of action?

prompts.title: Analyze Symptom
prompts.text: I've noticed a slight vibration when accelerating above 60 mph. What are the most likely causes for this?

categories.name: Performance & Efficiency
categories.description: Prompts for optimizing vehicle performance and economy.

prompts.title: Improve Fuel Efficiency
prompts.text: Suggest three ways I can improve my vehicle's fuel efficiency for a long road trip I have planned for next week.

prompts.title: Sport Mode Tuning
prompts.text: How can I adjust the suspension and throttle response settings for a sportier driving experience on a closed track?

prompts.title: Analyze Driving Style
prompts.text: Analyze my driving data from the last 50 miles and recommend changes to my driving style for better battery conservation.

categories.name: Navigation & Trip Planning
categories.description: Prompts for advanced route-finding and travel assistance.

prompts.title: Scenic Route
prompts.text: Plan a scenic route from San Francisco to Los Angeles, avoiding major highways. Include at least two charging stops with fast chargers.

prompts.title: Find Points of Interest
prompts.text: What are some interesting historical points of interest along my current route to Denver, Colorado?

prompts.title: Emergency Route
prompts.text: Find the fastest route to the nearest hospital with an emergency room, taking into account current traffic conditions.

categories.name: System Commands & Info
categories.description: Prompts for interacting with vehicle systems.

prompts.title: Set Cabin Climate
prompts.text: Set cabin temperature to 21 degrees Celsius and engage the 'Nebula' ambient lighting profile.

prompts.title: Firmware Features
prompts.text: Explain the key features and improvements in the latest firmware update (v3.1.4) in simple terms.

prompts.title: Vehicle Status Summary
prompts.text: Provide a summary of my vehicle's operational status over the last 24 hours, including battery usage and efficiency.

categories.name: Bridge Communications
categories.description: Prompts for interacting with communications channels.

prompts.title: Hail Fleet Command
prompts.text: Open a secure channel to Fleet Command and request a status update on operation Chimera.

prompts.title: Scan Broadcasts
prompts.text: Scan open channels for any mention of the freighter 'Odyssey'. Summarize your findings.

prompts.title: Log Distress Call
prompts.text: Log the last distress call from the 'UNKNOWN SIGNAL' and plot its origin coordinates on the navigation map.
